short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Sample any audio on the web with a click! Record and download audio directly from your browser.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
No need for shady downloader websites, just click record and save the audio.
New and improved version now features a library where you can save files to download later.

**NEW IN v2.0 - 23/09/2024**:

• Cloud based library - Save samples for download later, unlimited file storage

• Settings
    - Use name of playing tab as default sample name
    - Mute current tab while recording
    - Automatically trim silence from start and end

• Open with keyboard shortcut
    - Ctrl + Shift + Y  - default shortcut
    -  Set your own custom shortcut from chrome://extensions/shortcuts

• No length limitations for recording
• Maximum size for files saved to library is 50 MB
